Container.Name: OpenStreamingPlatform
Container.Overview: Open Streaming Platform (OSP) is an open-source, RTMP streamer software front-end for Arut's NGINX RTMP Module. OSP was designed a self-hosted alternative to services like Twitch.tv, Ustream.tv, and Youtube Live. OSP is still considered Beta and is not complete
Container.Description: Open Streaming Platform (OSP) is an open-source, RTMP streamer software front-end for Arut's NGINX RTMP Module. OSP was designed a self-hosted alternative to services like Twitch.tv, Ustream.tv, and Youtube Live. OSP is still considered Beta and is not complete

Config.Name: REDIS_HOST
Config.Description: REDIS_HOST: Sets the Redis Instance IP/Hostname (REQUIRED)

Config.Name: REDIS_PORT
Config.Description: REDIS_PORT: Sets the Redis Instance Port

Config.Name: REDIS_PASSWORD
Config.Description: REDIS_PASSWORD: Sets the Redis Instance Password, if needed

Config.Name: DB_URL
Config.Description: DB_URL: Sets the SQLAlchemy URL String for the used DB. Default:

Config.Name: OSP_ALLOWREGISTRATION
Config.Description:
OSP_ALLOWREGISTRATION: Sets OSP to allow users to create accounts
Default: True

Config.Name: OSP_REQUIREVERIFICATION
Config.Description:
OSP_REQUIREVERIFICATION: Sets New OSP user accounts to verify their email addresses
Default: True

Config.Name: Storage
Config.Description: /var/www - Storage of Images, Streams, and Stored Video Files

Config.Description: /opt/osp/db/ - SQLite DB Location (if used) - SQLite DB Location (if used)
